title: boo!
content: No sunglasses... keep the expressive eyes!  :-)[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png[/img]

title: boo!
content:
My eyes! They burn with the awsomeness of your work.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]
Seriously they look cool though I too prefer to keep the sunglasses off. Keep up the good work.

title: Classiness.
content:
No glasses! They only serve to make him look too clich, and the eyes rock as they are anyway.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

"You are so afraid to live--so afraid of life itself--that you've given up the very nature of your being in trade for security."

title: w00t
content:
KEEN 3D w00t!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

I think the sunglasses look cool, but Mort looks better without them. It's easier to scare people without them. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

title: Re: w00t
content: The sun glasses aren't bad, but I suggest not using them. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] Goo work.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: w00t
content:
Depends on what you're going use this model for (you didn't tell us). It would only use sunglasses for some variation if you're going to use it multiple times.-----------------
[img]http://www.jamba.nl/storage/view/upload/logo/image_multijpeg/DevilFrogVerwandlung.jpg[/img][img]http://www.jamster.com/s/jiw/img/US_logo_big.gif[/img]
Jamster! rules!

title: Re: w00t
content:
Maybe just use them outside, where sunglasses make some sense. Of course, that only works if you show it mih inside without the glasses. If you didn't, then it would just seem like he wore them all the time.

[quote]Quote:[hr] This deserves cel-rendering. That would look so awesome. Pity you'd have to wait a few days for the render to complete.[hr][/quote]
I just noticed this. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img] Blender can accomplish a sort of cell rendering effect very easily, so maybe that's not such a crazy idea.________________
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v462/lemur821/YorpEye.png[/img]

title: Re: w00t
content:
Really, Blender can? Do go on.

Anyway, this Mort model is just an image I'm working on that will hopefully look cool, which will also help me learn about Blender in the process.

Also, I'll probably remove the sunglasses. I may make two versions, though. One with sunglasses and one without.-----
[img]http://gnosticus.spatang.com/PBF056BCPuppyWish.jpg[/img]

title: Eyes
content: Keep the eyes, with no glasses. If you really want them covered, consider putting a high-tech visor in Mort's helmet. I'd imagine Mortimer McMire would have one.
